Action.author: sambhavdutt
Action.body: WARN 001 Omitting the channel ID for configtxgen is deprecated. Explicitly passing the channel ID will be required in the future, defaulting to 'testchainid'. 02:46:02 2018-05-22 02:46:02.644 UTC common/tools/configtxgen main -> INFO 002 Loading configuration 02:46:02 2018-05-22 02:46:02.712 UTC msp getMspConfig -> INFO 003 Loading NodeOUs 02:46:02 2018-05-22 02:46:02.713 UTC msp getMspConfig -> INFO 004 Loading NodeOUs 02:46:02 2018-05-22 02:46:02.714 UTC common/tools/configtxgen/encoder New -> CRIT 005 Error creating channel group: could not create consortiums group: failed to create consortium SampleConsortium: failed to create consortium org: 1 - Error loading MSP configuration for org: Org3MSP: failed to read issuer public key file: could not read file /w/workspace/fabric-end-2-end-daily-master-x86_64/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric/examples/e2e_cli/crypto-config/idemix/msp/IssuerPublicKey: open /w/workspace/fabric-end-2-end-daily-master-x86_64/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric/examples/e2e_cli/crypto-config/idemix/msp/IssuerPublicKey: no such file or directory {code} *Build Logs* https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-end-2-end-daily-master-x86_64/78/ >
